Griffin''' (born March 22, 1972){{cite news | title = Dax Griffin | publisher = ''CBS Broadcasting, Inc.'' | author= | url = http://www.cbs.com/daytime/bb/about/bios/dgriffin.shtml | accessdate = 2008-02-18 |archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20071213064543/http://www.cbs.com/daytime/bb/about/bios/dgriffin.shtml |archivedate = 2007-12-13}} is an [[United States|American]] [[actor]]. ==Career== Griffin is known for his role as [[Tim Truman (TV character)|Tim Truman]] on the [[NBC]] serial ''[[Sunset Beach (TV series)|Sunset Beach]]'' from January 1997 until November 1999. He had one more appearance in the series finale in a dream sequence. He also played assistant district attorney Justin McCoy on ''[[All My Children]]'' in 2003. Griffin joined the cast of ''[[The Bold and the Beautiful]]'' in the role of [[Shane McGrath (The Bold and the Beautiful)|Shane McGrath]] on September 12, 2006. He left the show on April 20, 2007, when his character was killed off. Griffin also played Albert Grabner in the TV commercial for the Japanese video game [[Front Mission: Gun Hazard]], and is listed in the game's credits for that role. Griffin made an appearance as "[[List of minor characters in the Firefly universe#Bester|Bester]]" on ''[[Firefly (TV series)|Firefly]]'' as [[Serenity (Firefly vessel)|Serenity]]'s original engine mechanic. He has also made guest appearances on [[Charmed]], [[CSI: Crime Scene Investigation|CSI]] and [[Drop Dead Diva]]. ==Personal life== Griffin was born in [[Atlanta, Georgia]]. He grew up in the Atlanta suburb of Marietta and graduated from Joseph Wheeler High School in 1990. In 1995, he graduated from the University of Alabama with a degree in [[business marketing]]. He formerly lived with and was in a relationship with actress [[Amelia Heinle]] ([[Victoria Newman|Victoria]], ''[[The Young and the Restless]]''){{cite news | title = Sunset Beach Boy Makes Bold Career Move | publisher = ''TV Guide'' | author= Daniel R. Coleridge | url = http://www.tvguide.com/News-Views/Soaps/QA/default.aspx?posting={FC9FFC22-8515-482C-862B-CA356FF52888} | accessdate = 2008-02-18 |archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20080414064121/http://www.tvguide.com/News-Views/Soaps/QA/default.aspx?posting=%7bFC9FFC22-8515-482C-862B-CA356FF52888%7d |archivedate = 2008-04-14}} and was also formerly involved with former ''[[The Bold and the Beautiful]]'' co-star [[Jennifer Gareis]].
